QuestData.Title: Press Fire
QuestData.Description: Safety systems, online! Motor functions, functioning! Now all we need is to make sure that the guns will fire.$b$bThis shouldn't be too hard, $n. The mechano-tank on the hill behind us has been loaded with harmless pellets. Just fire off a couple rounds at the nearby targets and report back to me.
QuestData.LogDescription: Test out the Shooting Mechano-Tank weapon systems on the nearby targets.
